item.title: ~git~ blog init
item.description: How ya doin’ folks? $ sudo docker build -t us.gcr.io/hugo-themes/terminal . $ python3 test.py Now playing Slow Crush - Aurora
item.content:
How ya doin’ folks?

$ sudo docker build -t us.gcr.io/hugo-themes/terminal .
$ python3 test.py

Now playing Slow Crush - Aurora

item.title: About
item.description: Hi all This is Alex here, you can find me in twitter as @dev_gazer. I will start posting to this blog hosted in GitHub as a guide to my repositories and online projects. You can expect from me regular uploads and maintenance. I usually code in Python but you can expect some content in other languages such as php, C++, and in various subjects such as Computer Vision, DevOps, Database Integration, Cloud Computing, automation and so on!
item.content:
Hi all

This is Alex here, you can find me in twitter as @dev_gazer. I will start posting to this blog hosted in GitHub as a guide to my repositories and online projects.

You can expect from me regular uploads and maintenance.

I usually code in Python but you can expect some content in other languages such as php, C++, and in various subjects such as Computer Vision, DevOps, Database Integration, Cloud Computing, automation and so on!

Grab a beer and cheers!
